snippet: GREENWALD--Ted. With profound sadness, we announce the death of Theodore Mitchell Greenwald, 73, who died on June 17, 2016. He is survived by his wife, Joan McClusky, their daughter, Abigail Greenwald, and three sisters. Born in Brooklyn in 1942, Ted was first, last and always a New Yorker. He was also a prolific and gifted poet, a great friend, and had a passionate love of and interest in life and people. He will be greatly missed by the many who enjoyed his company, his works, and his generous and joyous spirit. A memorial service is planned for the fall. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREENWALD--Ted. With profound sadness, we announce the death of Theodore Mitchell Greenwald, 73, who died on June 17, 2016. He is survived by his wife, Joan McClusky, their daughter, Abigail Greenwald, and three sisters. Born in Brooklyn in 1942, Ted was first, last and always a New Yorker. He was also a prolific and gifted poet, a great friend, and had a passionate love of and interest in life and people. He will be greatly missed by the many who enjoyed his company, his works, and his generous and joyous spirit. A memorial service is planned for the fall. 1/3
